title: Remove Caffeine branding and add social share buttons with real-time stats

requirements.summary: Remove all 'Caffeine' branding references from the Footer component
acceptanceCriteria: No mentions of 'Caffeine' or 'caffeine.ai' appear in any footer
Footer component does not contain Caffeine attribution

file_operations.description: Remove all references to 'Powered by caffeine.ai' text and caffeine.ai attribution links from the Footer component. Clean up any branding elements that mention Caffeine.

requirements.summary: Add social media share buttons to the footer with platform-specific links
acceptanceCriteria: Footer contains clickable icons/buttons for X/Twitter, Telegram, WhatsApp, and LinkedIn
All social share buttons are functional and open appropriate sharing dialogs

file_operations.description: Add social media share buttons (X/Twitter, Telegram, WhatsApp, LinkedIn) to the footer. The X/Twitter link must include the #CanisterTask hashtag. Each button should open the appropriate sharing dialog with the current page URL and relevant metadata. Use Lucide React icons or emoji icons for visual representation.

requirements.summary: Add a 7-day earnings chart for HCoragem to the admin dashboard showing daily earnings trends
acceptanceCriteria: Admin dashboard displays a line or bar chart showing earnings over the last 7 days
Chart data is fetched from the backend with daily earnings aggregation
Chart updates in real-time or on page refresh

file_operations.description: Add a 7-day earnings chart component to the admin dashboard. Use the existing getLast7DaysStats backend capability (returns Array<DailySummary> with day, taskCount, completedTasks, totalAmount, completedAmount fields) to fetch daily earnings data. Implement a line or bar chart using Recharts or a similar charting library (already used in the project based on dependencies). Display earnings trends over the last 7 days with proper labels, tooltips, and responsive design. The chart should show daily earnings (completedAmount or totalAmount) on the Y-axis and dates on the X-axis.

Add or verify the useLast7DaysStats query hook that fetches 7-day earnings statistics using the getLast7DaysStats backend capability. Ensure proper error handling, loading states, and React Query configuration. The hook should return the daily earnings data in a format consumable by the chart component.

requirements.summary: Add real-time statistics cards to the admin dashboard showing today's total tasks and completed tasks count
acceptanceCriteria: Admin dashboard displays a card showing total tasks created today
Admin dashboard displays a card showing total tasks completed today
Statistics update automatically or on refresh

file_operations.description: Add two statistic cards to the admin dashboard displaying today's total tasks and today's completed tasks. Use the existing getDailySummary backend capability (returns { day, taskCount, completedTasks, totalAmount, completedAmount }) to fetch today's statistics. Display these metrics in visually distinct cards with appropriate icons, labels, and styling consistent with the existing dashboard design. Position these cards prominently in the dashboard layout, ideally near other key metrics.

Add or verify the useDailySummary query hook that fetches today's task statistics using the getDailySummary backend capability. Configure React Query with appropriate refetch intervals for real-time updates. Ensure proper typing with the DailySummary interface from backend.d.ts.
